mapper.select: select t.id, t.param_code, t.param_item, t.param_value, t.type, d.dic_content as typeContent, t.enabled, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.del_flag from ba_time_param t left join sys_data_dic d on d.dic_code=t.type where 1=1 and t.del_flag=#{timeParamCo.delFlag}

select t.id, t.param_code, t.param_item, t.param_value, t.type, t.enabled, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.del_flag, c.id as customerId, c.customer_name as customerName, pt.pg_id as projectId, pg.pg_name as projectName from ba_time_param t left join ba_pg_time_param pt on t.id = pt.t_p_id left join ba_project_group pg on pt.pg_id = pg.id left join ba_customer c on c.id = pg.customer_id where t.id=#{id} and t.enabled=#{enabled}
